channel.title: Can some one help me with this?
channel.description:
There's somthing wrong With this code after it hides it won't show after i hit x
Here's the code [code]program New; begin GetSelf.Hide If(IsKeyDown('x'))then GetSelf.Show Wait(5000) repeat ClickMouse(500, 146, True); until(IsKeyDown('z')) end.[/code]

item.title: Can some one help me with this?
item.dc:creator: @dave5534 dave5534
item.description:
@dave5534 wrote:

Thanks every one for all the help and I fixed the script

begin GetSelf.Hide Wait(5000) repeat ClickMouse(512, 492, True); if(IsKeyDown('x'))then Wait(500) GetSelf.Show until(IsKeyDown('z')) ClearDebug; end.

Read full topic
item.source: Can some one help me with this?

item.title: Can some one help me with this?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Ok, lets take a look at the code and simplify it for you:

begin // starts the new line
GetSelf.Hide // this hides scar
If(IsKeyDown(‘x’))then // if the key x is down then do
GetSelf.Show // this shows scar
Wait(5000) // this waits for 5 second
repeat // this repeats clicking the mouse until z is down
ClickMouse(500, 146, True);
until(IsKeyDown(‘z’))
end.

If you don’t understand that, PM me on mopar or add my msn: niallcoates@msn.com or look up some SCAR tutorials.

Read full topic
item.source: Can some one help me with this?
